awashyaya wanne hariyata muladharma therum ganimayi.ugannanna oona dewal danne nathi wunama oya wage wachanayak allagena eeka waradiyi meka waradiyi kiya kiya kale yawala lamayi sura kana guruwaru oona tharam innawa.me rate godak inne guruwaru neweyi guru horu.ugannanna ee ayata therenne na.lankawe honda guruwaru nathuwama neweyi.ee wage aya hoyaganna amaru nisa thamayi me blog ekath patan gaththe.me blog eke paramarthaya thamayi therena sarala sinhalen gitaraya wadanaya karanna kiyala dena eka.sarala bhashawen liya wunata mulika muladharma oyalata nodanima hondata therewi.baya wenna epa digatama randi inna.saralawa mama kiyala dennam.oone prashnayak ahanna.me blog eka oyalata loku prayojanayak weyi kiyala man hithanawa.
